question: How many podcasts are there in the category which has the most podcasts?
query: SELECT COUNT(podcast_id) FROM categories WHERE category = ( SELECT category FROM categories GROUP BY category ORDER BY COUNT(podcast_id) DESC LIMIT 1 )

question: What is the percentage of the podcast that are categorized in four or more categories?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.podcast_id) FROM ( SELECT podcast_id FROM categories GROUP BY podcast_id HAVING COUNT(category) >= 4 ) AS T1

question: Provide the itunes id and url for podcast titled 'Brown Suga Diaries'.
query: SELECT itunes_id, itunes_url FROM podcasts WHERE title = 'Brown Suga Diaries'

question: List all podcast with its itunes url for all title containing the word 'Dream'.
query: SELECT itunes_url FROM podcasts WHERE title LIKE '%Dream%' GROUP BY itunes_url

question: Name all the categories for podcast titled 'I Heart My Life Show'.
query: SELECT T1.category FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.title = 'I Heart My Life Show'

question: List all the podcast title and its itunes url under the 'society-culture' category.
query: SELECT T2.title, T2.itunes_url FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'society-culture'

question: How many people rated 5 for the podcast which title contains the word 'spoiler' under the 'art' category '?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.podcast_id) FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id INNER JOIN reviews AS T3 ON T3.podcast_id = T2.podcast_id WHERE T2.title LIKE '%spoilers%' AND T1.category = 'arts' AND T3.rating = 5

question: List the authors who created review for podcast titled 'Pop Rocket' in 2016 with rating less than 5.
query: SELECT T2.author_id FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'Pop Rocket' AND T2.created_at LIKE '2016-%' AND T2.rating < 5

question: Name all the podcast title and its category with average rating of more than 3.0.
query: SELECT T2.title, T1.category FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id INNER JOIN reviews AS T3 ON T3.podcast_id = T2.podcast_id GROUP BY T3.podcast_id HAVING AVG(T3.rating) > 3

question: List all content reviewed for podcast with the best rating under the 'fiction' category. State the podcast title.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id INNER JOIN reviews AS T3 ON T3.podcast_id = T2.podcast_id WHERE T3.rating = 5 AND T1.category = 'fiction'

question: State the podcast title, content review and rating for all reviews with titled 'Love it!'
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.title, T2.content, T2.rating FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.title = 'Love it!'

question: Find the author, rating and review creation date of review for podcast title 'In The Thick'.
query: SELECT T2.author_id, T2.rating, T2.created_at FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'In The Thick' GROUP BY T2.author_id, T2.rating, T2.created_at

question: Which podcast was reviewed the latest? State the date of creation, podcast tile and rating.
query: SELECT T1.podcast_id, T2.created_at, T2.title, T2.rating FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id ORDER BY T2.created_at DESC LIMIT 1

question: Name the podcast title, rating and review content created by '76A4C24B6038145'.
query: SELECT T2.title, T2.rating, T2.content FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.author_id = '76A4C24B6038145'

question: For all reviews with the worst rating, state the podcast title as well as the review title and content.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.title, T2.title, T2.content FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.rating = 1

question: List all reviews created in May 2019. State the title of podcast and review rating.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.title, T2.rating FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.created_at LIKE '2019-05-%'

question: What is the average rating for the podcast that is most reviewed?
query: SELECT AVG(T2.rating) FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id GROUP BY T1.podcast_id ORDER BY COUNT(T2.content) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which category does the podcast titled 'SciFi Tech Talk' belong to?
query: SELECT T1.category FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.title = 'SciFi Tech Talk'

question: What is the name of the podcast in which a commentor left a comment with the title 'Long time listener, calling it quits?' Include the URL of the podcast as well.
query: SELECT podcast_id, itunes_url FROM podcasts WHERE podcast_id = ( SELECT podcast_id FROM reviews WHERE title = 'Long time listener, calling it quits' )

question: List all the names of podcasts under the 'true crime' category.
query: SELECT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'true-crime'

question: Write all the review content belonging to StormCast: The Official Warhammer Age of Sigmar Podcast.
query: SELECT content FROM reviews WHERE podcast_id = ( SELECT podcast_id FROM podcasts WHERE title = 'StormCast: The Official Warhammer Age of Sigmar Podcast' )

question: Write all the review titles and the contents belonging to the podcast 'More Stupider: A 90-Day Fiance Podcast' with a review rating of 1.
query: SELECT title, content FROM reviews WHERE podcast_id = ( SELECT podcast_id FROM podcasts WHERE title = 'More Stupider: A 90-Day Fiance Podcast' ) AND rating = 1

question: How many reviews does 'LifeAfter/The Message' have which were rated below 3?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.rating) FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'LifeAfter/The Message' AND T2.rating <= 3

question: The 'More Stupider: A 90-Day Fiance Podcast' belongs to which category and what is the average rating of the podcast?
query: SELECT AVG(T3.rating) FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id INNER JOIN reviews AS T3 ON T3.podcast_id = T2.podcast_id WHERE T2.title = 'More Stupider: A 90-Day Fiance Podcast'

question: Of the arts-books and arts-design categories, which one has more podcasts and what is the numerical difference between them?
query: SELECT ( SELECT category FROM categories WHERE category = 'arts-books' OR category = 'arts-design' GROUP BY category ORDER BY COUNT(podcast_id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) "has more podcasts" , ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN category = 'arts-books' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN category = 'arts-design' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM categories ) "differenct BETWEEN arts-books and arts-design"

question: How many total reviews runned at in June 2022 were added to the podcasts?
query: SELECT SUM(reviews_added) FROM runs WHERE run_at LIKE '2022-06-%'

question: How many podcast reviews with a rating of 3 were created during the first quarter of 2015?
query: SELECT COUNT(podcast_id) FROM reviews WHERE rating = 3 AND created_at BETWEEN '2015-01-01T00:00:00-07:00' AND '2015-03-31T23:59:59-07:00'

question: Calculate the percentage of podcasts in the fiction-science-fiction category.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN category = 'fiction-science-fiction' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(podcast_id) OR '%' "percentage" FROM categories

question: What is the average rating of all the podcasts with reviews created in 2019?
query: SELECT AVG(rating) FROM reviews WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2019-01-01T00:00:00-07:00' AND '2019-12-31T23:59:59-07:00'

question: What is the percentage of reviews added each year of the total reviews added?
query: SELECT CAST((SUM(CASE WHEN run_at LIKE '2022-%' THEN reviews_added ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN run_at LIKE '2021-%' THEN reviews_added ELSE 0 END)) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(reviews_added) OR '%' "percentage" FROM runs

question: Indicates the title of all podcasts in the fiction category.
query: SELECT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'fiction'

question: What is the rating and category of the podcast entitled Sitcomadon?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.rating, T1.category FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id INNER JOIN reviews AS T3 ON T3.podcast_id = T2.podcast_id WHERE T2.title = 'Sitcomadon'

question: Indicate the id of the reviewer whose itunes id is 1516665400.
query: SELECT T2.author_id FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.itunes_id = 1516665400

question: What are the titles of the podcasts whose reviews were created between 2018-08-22T11:53:16-07:00 and 2018-11-20T11:14:20-07:00?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.title FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.created_at BETWEEN '2018-08-22T11:53:16-07:00' AND '2018-11-20T11:14:20-07:00'

question: To which categories do the podcasts of the reviewer whose id is EFB34EAC8E9397C belong?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.category FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.author_id = 'EFB34EAC8E9397C'

question: Indicate the slug and the itunes url of the podcast whose review content was written Can't stop listening.
query: SELECT slug, itunes_url FROM podcasts WHERE podcast_id IN ( SELECT podcast_id FROM reviews WHERE content = 'Can''t stop listening' )

question: What dates were the Don't Lie To Your Life Coach podcast reviews created?
query: SELECT created_at FROM reviews WHERE podcast_id = ( SELECT podcast_id FROM podcasts WHERE title = 'Don''t Lie To Your Life Coach' )

question: In how many categories were podcast reviews created in the last six months of 2016? List them.
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T1.category) FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.created_at BETWEEN '2016-07-01T00:00:00-07:00' AND '2016-12-31T23:59:59-07:00'

question: Calculate the average rating of the true crime category.
query: SELECT AVG(T2.rating) FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'true-crime'

question: List the titles of the art category.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'arts'

question: What is the average rating of all the podcasts in category art?
query: SELECT AVG(T2.rating) FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'arts'

question: Provide the names of podcasts in the art category in 2018.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'arts' AND T2.created_at LIKE '2018-%'

question: Write the names of the podcasts in the music category that have a rating greater than 3.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'music' AND T2.rating > 3

question: Which titles have the content "love" but the category is art produced between 2018 and 2019.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE (T2.created_at LIKE '2018-%' AND T1.category = 'arts' AND T2.content LIKE '%love%') OR (T2.created_at LIKE '2019-%' AND T1.category = 'arts' AND T2.content LIKE '%love%')

question: What is the category and itune url of the title "Scaling Global"?
query: SELECT T1.category, T2.itunes_url FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.title = 'Scaling Global'

question: What is the average rating of podcasts in comedy category?
query: SELECT AVG(T2.rating) FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'comedy'

question: What is the least common category?
query: SELECT category FROM categories GROUP BY category ORDER BY COUNT(podcast_id) ASC LIMIT 1

question: What is the longest review?
query: SELECT title FROM reviews ORDER BY LENGTH(content) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the review with the title "Hosts bring the show down" for?
query: SELECT title FROM podcasts WHERE podcast_id = ( SELECT podcast_id FROM reviews WHERE title = 'Hosts bring the show down' )

question: Which "music" podcast has the longest title?
query: SELECT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'music' ORDER BY LENGTH(T2.title) DESC LIMIT 1

question: List all the cagetories for all the podcasts with "jessica" in the title.
query: SELECT category FROM categories WHERE podcast_id IN ( SELECT podcast_id FROM podcasts WHERE title LIKE '%jessica%' )

question: What is the category for the "Moist Boys" podcast?
query: SELECT category FROM categories WHERE podcast_id IN ( SELECT podcast_id FROM podcasts WHERE title = 'Moist Boys' )

question: List all of the two-star reviews and their categories.
query: SELECT T1.category FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.rating = 2

question: List all the podcasts reviewed by a reviewer who has a review titled "Inspired & On Fire!".
query: SELECT T1.title FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.title = 'Inspired & On Fire!'

question: What are the titles and categories of all the podcasts with a review that has "Absolutely fantastic" in it?
query: SELECT T2.title, T1.category FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id INNER JOIN reviews AS T3 ON T3.podcast_id = T2.podcast_id WHERE T3.content LIKE '%Absolutely fantastic%'

question: Which category has the most reviews?
query: SELECT T1.category FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id GROUP BY T1.category ORDER BY COUNT(T2.podcast_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: List the urls for all the "fiction-science-fiction" podcasts.
query: SELECT itunes_url FROM podcasts WHERE podcast_id IN ( SELECT podcast_id FROM categories WHERE category = 'fiction-science-fiction' )

question: What is the content of the earliest review for the "Stuff You Should Know" podcast?
query: SELECT T2.content FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'Stuff You Should Know' ORDER BY T2.created_at ASC LIMIT 1

question: How many reviews does "Planet Money" have?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.podcast_id) FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'Planet Money'

question: What is the average rating for the "crime-junkie" podcast?
query: SELECT AVG(T2.rating) FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'Crime Junkie'

question: What percentage of podcasts are "technology" podcasts? List all of them.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.category = 'technology' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.title) OR '%' "percentage" FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id

question: What is the content of the review under the title "really interesting!" and is created on 2018-04-24 at 12:05:16?
query: SELECT content FROM reviews WHERE title = 'really interesting!' AND created_at = '2018-04-24T12:05:16-07:00'

question: Which category is the podcast "Scaling Global" under?
query: SELECT category FROM categories WHERE podcast_id IN ( SELECT podcast_id FROM podcasts WHERE title = 'Scaling Global' )

question: Please list the titles of all the podcasts under the category "arts-performing-arts".
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.title FROM categories AS T1 INNER JOIN podcasts AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.category = 'arts-performing-arts'

question: How many reviews are created for the podcast "Scaling Global" under?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.content) FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'Scaling Global'

question: Among the reviews for the podcast "Please Excuse My Dead Aunt Sally", how many of them are made in the year 2019?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.created_at) FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'Please Excuse My Dead Aunt Sally' AND T2.created_at LIKE '2019-%'

question: Please list the titles of the podcasts for which the author whose ID is F7E5A318989779D has written a review.
query: SELECT T2.title FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T2.author_id = 'F7E5A318989779D'

question: How many ratings of 5 have been given to the podcast "Please Excuse My Dead Aunt Sally"?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.rating) FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'Please Excuse My Dead Aunt Sally' AND T2.rating = 5

question: What is the average rating of the podcast "Please Excuse My Dead Aunt Sally"?
query: SELECT AVG(T2.rating) FROM podcasts AS T1 INNER JOIN reviews AS T2 ON T2.podcast_id = T1.podcast_id WHERE T1.title = 'Please Excuse My Dead Aunt Sally'
